Title: Last Call
Writer: Sam Raimi (based on characters created by), Sam Raimi (developed for television by), Ivan Raimi (developed for television by), Tom Spezialy (developed for television by), William Bromell (story editor), Noelle Valdivia
Actors: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Ted Raimi
Plot: Local teens raise hell when they steal the Delta from Brock's house. Ash and his best buddy Chet devise a plan to throw a party at the bar, lure the thieves in, and get the Delta and the Necronomicon back.
